.. vim: set fileencoding=utf-8 :
.. _bob.ip.caffe_extractor:

=================================================
 Bob interface for feature extraction using Caffe
=================================================

This package contains functionality to extract features from CNNs trained with
Caffe http://caffe.berkeleyvision.org/.

This package also wraps several famous caffe models:

* The :any:`VGG face model <bob.ip.caffe_extractor.VGGFace>` trained by Oxford:
  http://www.robots.ox.ac.uk/~vgg/software/vgg_face/.
* The :any:`Light CNN model <bob.ip.caffe_extractor.LightCNN>` available at:
  https://github.com/AlfredXiangWu/face_verification_experiment.

=====
